articles.content: After a discount of Rs 66,491, this smart TV is selling on Amazon at Rs 43,499. It offers 4K resolution and a 60Hz refresh rate.

articles.title: Windows 10X booted on the Lumia 950XL shows Microsoft’s OS scales well on mobile - XDA Developers
articles.description: No, your eyes don't deceive you. Someone really did manage to get an early build of Windows 10X running on a Lumia 950XL.
articles.content: These past few weeks have shown us that Microsofts Windows 10X should be a formidable alternative to Chrome OS. It seems to work well with a mouse and keyboard and on laptops with touch screens. Now,… [+1975 chars]

articles.title: Netflix Is Rolling Out A Useful New Feature For Subscribers - We Got This Covered
articles.description: Netflix are rolling out a useful new feature for subscribers that'll make it easier to find new content, and we look at how it works.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S21 Plus vs. OnePlus 8 Pro - Digital Trends
articles.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Plus is one of the best phones you can buy for $1,000, but is it better than the OnePlus 8 Pro? We put the pair to the test.
